title: @Riot, where does a 6 Stack Iron Potion Lulu Ulted Cho'Gath go when Tahm eats him?
body: like wtf this is some fucked up clown car shit right here. I demand a satisfying explanation.

replies.body: Tahm's stomach is an extra dimensional space, like a portable hole or bag of holding.
Or Kirby.

> [{quoted}](name=Zhugan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V75im9XX,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-14T20:42:19.351+0000)
>
> Tahm's stomach is an extra dimensional space, like a portable hole or bag of holding.

Tis a bag of devouring, or whatever that bag that eats things is called
Doraemon?
He simply heavily compresses and contorts Cho'Gath inside his stomach, hence all the %max health regurgitation damage. It's not to bad going down; pretty painful coming back up and out.
when talking about painful meals... did you know fiora can parry tahms W on the way out? i learned it hard way...

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V75im9XX,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-08-15T03:11:05.706+0000)
>
> He simply heavily compresses and contorts Cho'Gath inside his stomach, hence all the %max health regurgitation damage. It's not to bad going down; pretty painful coming back up and out.

Zac would be a bigger meal, but I'm guessing he makes a smoother transition both ways. {{champion:154}}
Biggest Jello shot on the rift
He probably uses Brush physics.
It's bigger on the inside.
They should totally make a skin where Tahm has a fez and bowtie
NEED

~~NEED~~

ALONSO!
ALLON-Y

AND MY AXE!

Wait, wrong phrase.

 _**ALLONS-Y!**_
Er, pretty sure other champs would be far better for that reference.
I was gonna go into a long expanation about mythological demons and their ability to use metaphor literally, but this pretty much sums up what I intended to say.
Or smaller on the outside .3.
God I love you right now. Which Doctor is your favorite? I need to know this
Depending on who you call it, its the  11th or Matt Smith.
To clarify, i was asking which doctor is his favorite. Mine is Tennant for sure.

Upvote for #TeamTennant

There are many flowers in the world, but only one Rose.

~~Why was 9 mad at 10? Cause 10 lost 9's rose.~~
Rose was not that great of a companion. She just kinda felt 2 dimensional. Compare her to Donna or Martha, who were much more complex and fleshed out of characters. AND ROSE HAD TWICE AS LONG!
tbh Donna was my favorite (DoctorDonna Friends!) I loved the way she talked and how they scripted her words.

She actually wasn't too heavily scripted. Because she is actually a comedian as well as an actor, they left her script somewhat loose, to leave room for funny things (I guarantee you the "I just need a mate." "You want to mate?" thing was not an original thing, and she came up with it.
Really? Thats pretty cool. I stopped watching Doctor Who because school and they killed the 11th so I was like okay moving on. The 10th and 11th will always gave a place in my heart.
It is because "he hungers for things less literal." {{champion:223}}
The Chameleon circuit of the T.A.R.D.I.S. started to function normally, meaning Tahm is really the Doctor disguised as a Champion in League.
Just an FYI Tahm can eat another Tahm that has eaten a Cho'Gath
Once upon a time {{champion:223}}  swallowed the TARDIS, the end.

The better question is, why can't he eat any objective monsters?

He'd rather put Urgot in his mouth then secure baron.
Tahm is a TAHM LORD!

Tahm's mouth/esophagus is an inter-dimensional portal.  His ult is him swallowing himself, traveling a short distance (see concept: 'hypserspace'), and then regurgitating himself back into League's reality a greater distance from his starting location than that conventionally traversed.
In a thrusting motion
Tahm's stomach is an infinite void. Nothing can escape. Unless you're Gangplank, vitamin C-section.
A 6 stack Cho with iron elixir is already at the size limit; no need to waste an ult :P

> [{quoted}](name=ElJanitorFrank,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=V75im9XX,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-08-15T01:12:49.667+0000)
>
> A 6 stack Cho with iron elixir is already at the size limit; no need to waste an ult :P

Actually, if you really cared enough to find out, you'd know that he gets bigger than that, and if you were creative enough, you'd find out he's going to be EVEN BIGGER this upcoming patch.

http://www.comicvine.com/images/1300-3564300

homunculus Tahm Skin
His stomach, obviously.

Tahm can eat a 6 Stack Iron Potion Lulu Ulted Cho'Gath but Graves can't have a cigar. No but to be honest why is Tahm able to eat a 6 Stack Iron Potion Lulu Ulted Cho'Gath but he can't eat blue or red?
More importantly with all your cc plus lulu there to help how is he able to get his w off on you???
Tahm's stomach actually leads into a storage dimension, from which he can recall important items like his pocket-watch and prisoners who would be convenient for the plot's drama.
He goes to Wonderland, where he meats WonderTeemo (convenniently located in [this thread)](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/iQjGPfjN-circus-teemo-skin).
You want clown car? Have an enemy Tahm Kench eat the other Tahm Kench while he still has Cho'Gath in his belly.
The same place {{champion:154}}  go

I know of a great image that perfectly relates to this, but it's nsfw.

icri FeelsBadMan

For the same reason Kirby can swallow Minibosses like Mr. Frosty or Bonkers that are three times his size in a single gulp.

It's fucking video game logic. What else did you expect?
Whenever he eats a Cho'Gath like that his mustache thingy should grow bigger.
